categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kutille was a male Human prison overseer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Ilum in 3640 BBY he was posted at an Imperial base at Ilum's Eastern Ice Shelf, where Supreme Commander Rans of the Galactic Republic was held captive. When a Republic operative stormed the prison to rescue Rans and his subordinates, Kutille tried to oppose him but was killed in the fighting.
Prison Overseer Kutille appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Ilum, who is the final boss of the quest "Prison Riot."
